desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

The key comprises of the following elements :- 1. Report Name 2. '.' 3. Line Number 4. '-' 5. Period End Date 6. '-' 7. Any of "A" - Account (STMT.ENTRY) "P" - P&L (CATEG.ENTRY) or "R" - Spec (Spec entry) 8. '-' 9. Sequence Number beginning with 1 E.g. GLSTD.1410-GBP-19970331-A-1
